ED_Title: Observer status for the Global  Environment Facility in the General Assembly
ED_DecisionText: At its 45th plenary meeting, on 7 December 2023, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Sixth Committee, (Footnote: A/78/452, para.7.)  decided to defer a decision on the request for observer status for the Global Environment Facility in the Assembly (Footnote: See A/72/195.)  until the seventy-ninth session of the Assembly.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/78/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
